= Babel
:toc: left
:url-website: https://babeljs.io/

{url-website}[[website\]]

https://ccoenraets.github.io/es6-tutorial/setup-babel/

transcompiler

== Installation

[,bash]
----
pnpm install babel-cli babel-core --save-dev
pnpm install babel-preset-es2015 --save-dev # ECMAScript 2015 preset
----

== Run

[,bash]
----
pnpm run babel
----
